name: mercury-icons
description: A comprehensive pack of SVG icons for Mercury Development projects
author: Ilia Rebenok

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --tag alpha
